participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, Emily is always looking for new experiences and adventures.
participant_1.background: i am a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. my father played violin professionally. i play several instruments.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Curious and insightful, Jessica loves learning new things and sharing her knowledge with others.
participant_2.background: i read a book every week. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i'm pregnant with my first child. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.
